creator: yoavs@computer.org
text: Initial implementation of BeanRenderer.  Needs commons-beanutils.

creator: psmith@apache.org
text:
Yoav, this is really good, I'd vote for this to go in the varia package, or the 
very least, the sandbox.  I can throw it in if you like (I've been wanting this 
myself for a while, saves having to use Commons Lang ToStringBuilder...).

Paul, if you want this go ahead and edit/commit it to your heart's desire, but 
judging from the fact it hasn't been done yet and I'm not as interested in it 
myself, I'm closing this issue.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
